Buffalo.Dnipro Ukrainian Cultural Center:
The Dnipro Ukrainian Cultural Center is a civic and social club located at 562 Genesee Street in Buffalo, New York.


== History ==
Dnipro, was built in 1914, designed by the Buffalo architect duo of August Esenwein and James Johnson. Originally constructed to be the headquarters of the Fraternal Order Orioles, the building was purchased by the Ukrainian American community from the City of Buffalo in 1955.
